name: PixelFem #19 - Minnie Bradley
description:
The piece celebrates the photograph of Minnie Bradley refusing to look at the camera in her Police Court mug shot. Minnie, 27, and 5 foot 2 inches tall was arrested in The United States on December 13, 1902 for larceny from a person (stealing). She listed her occupation as a prostitute and it was also noted that Minnie wore a wig. Police were renowned at the time to arrest people like Minnie with very little evidence and dishonest intent. Not much else is known about Minnie, but her attitude and resilience lives on in this work.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
